title: ParkEfficient – Parking & Asset Management
outcome_highlight: Built optimization features and connected multiple cloud APIs for real-time hardware control and smarter resource use.
description: As a senior developer, I worked across the stack to build and grow this platform. I developed the admin dashboard (AssetOS) with Filament and implemented core logic for the user app, including series bookings, analytics, and interactive maps with Leaflet.js. A big focus was on optimizing resources through contingent sharing/pooling and integrating third-party APIs. This included live barrier control with the Scheidt & Bachmann (entervo) API and EV charging data via ChargeX.

title: OfficeEfficient – Workspace Management
outcome_highlight: Built the main admin dashboard and data visualization engine, leveraging AI-powered development with Laravel Boost, Claude, and Gemini CLI.
description: I worked on both the backend and frontend to shape this platform. My role included building the admin dashboard with Filament and implementing core features for the user app, such as series bookings, activity logs, and resource maps with Leaflet.js. I also focused on utility optimization by adding sharing and pooling logic, and integrated external APIs to meet client requirements. This project involved exploring AI-powered development workflows using Laravel Boost with Claude and Gemini CLI to accelerate development cycles.

title: Linear – Heating Design BIM Tool
outcome_highlight: Rebuilt a BIM web app on the MERN stack, achieving 50x performance improvement: from 50 rooms in minutes to 2,500 rooms in 5 seconds.
description: I led the backend migration of this Building Information Modeling (BIM) app from Ruby/Sinatra to the MERN stack. As co-developer, I was solely responsible for the architecture, Node.js/Express development, database design, and testing. I introduced Redis to handle intensive calculations, which transformed the system's capability: calculations that previously failed at 50 rooms now process 2,500 rooms in just 5 seconds — a 50x improvement. The frontend was developed in React.js by a teammate.

title: Exultec.net – BPM Software
outcome_highlight: Developed core modules for a custom business process management system.
description: As part of the development team, I worked on both frontend and backend. On the frontend, I built Angular modules, while on the backend I developed REST APIs with LoopBack. My work powered features like shift planning, capacity pooling, and automated contract management. I also built a mobile invoice claim app using Ionic.

title: Vitcomex – Remittance Management System
outcome_highlight: Turned complex remittance data into clear reports and insights for a national financial service provider.
description: I supported the development of a Remittance Management System by focusing on financial reporting and analytics. My work included advanced SQL queries to extract and process transaction data, and creating visualizations for reports such as profit & loss, balance sheets, and commission summaries.

title: RelACS – SIRVA
outcome_highlight: Helped digitize relocation workflows by maintaining and extending a custom operations platform.
description: I worked on maintaining and enhancing a web application designed to replace manual Excel and Word processes for relocation management. My responsibilities included resolving technical issues, supporting daily operations, and building new features to manage client data and track relocation progress more effectively.
